Package http.server

Class WebServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • http.server.WebServer
  • public class WebServer
extends Object
    Example program from Chapter 1 Programming Spiders, Bots and Aggregators in Java Copyright 2001 by Jeff Heaton WebServer is a very simple web-server. Any request is responded with a very simple web-page.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jeff Heaton
